Home UI Elements Buttons

Context Buttons

Bootrap context buttons

Gradient Buttons

Bootrap context buttons with gradient.

Round Buttons

applies .btn-rounded to make round style

Float Buttons

applies .btn-float to make float style

Outline Buttons

applies .btn-outline to make ouline style

Rounded Outline Buttons

applies .btn-outline & .btn-rounded to make round ouline style

Buttons Sizes

applies .btn-lg, .btn-sm and .btn-xs to resize the button

btn-lg btn-lg
btn-md btn-md
btn-sm btn-sm
btn-xs btn-xs

Buttons Width

applies .btn-w-xl, .btn-w-lg, .btn-w-md and .btn-w-sm to customize button width.

Buttons Block

applies .btn-block to make button full width

btn-block

Buttons Group

Icon Buttons

Use btn-icon to create a icon button.

Use btn-outline to create a outline style.

applies .btn-rounded to make round style

applies .btn-float to make float style

applies .btn-outline & .btn-rounded to make round ouline style
